name: Invoice Generator (Google Docs)
description: A smart and reusable invoice template built on Google Docs. Designed for freelancers, consultants, and small business owners who need professional, customizable invoices without dealing with complex tools. Just duplicate, edit, and send — it's that simple.

sections.title: Instant Invoice Setup
sections.text: No more formatting headaches. Just open the template, plug in your details, and your invoice is ready to go. Designed to make billing look polished and professional in minutes.

sections.title: Customizable & Reusable
sections.text: Edit fields like client name, service description, rates, taxes, and totals. Save it once, reuse it every time. Perfect for recurring clients or varied billing needs.
